review: So far so good. I didn't realize you had to download all the apps but once I got the ones I wanted and it's been great.
author: Nikki Johnson

review: Absolutely LOVE!!! I have a chrome cast too but I like this way better! The only reason it's not getting 5 stars from me is b/c the Hulu app on it isn't playing, witch I'm really disappointed about b/c there r several things on Hulu that I'd love to watch! I can hear sound but the tv mostly stays black r gets stuck on a scene! VERY annoying!!! I haven't had any other issues than that w/ Hulu!
author: liz Bertrand

review: Great product. I wish it was more compatible with Windows 8 to share the screen
author: kelkelox325

review: Easy to install. I was a little disappointed with the list of movies available. Not too much we wanted to view but all  in all the price is right.
author: Marianne Gonzales

review: Exceeded expectations. Very easy to use.
author: John Zook

review: Works great, better than cable or Sat. TV
author: GORDON EZZELL
